resources.string: Our App is 100% safe & secure.Keeping the users data safe at all time is our utmost priority.Our team NEVER asks you for your bank details, credit card details, OTPs or UPI details. Do not share such information with anyone who claims to be from App or from our Media Pvt. Ltd. Any such call or communication seeking this information is fraudulent, we request you to report such instances with us on support@app.com

1. Each match will have a set of questions that you 
need to answer (predict) before the actual game starts.

 2. Once you have submitted an answer (prediction) 
you cannot change it later.

 3. You get 2 points for every right answer (prediction), -1 for every wrong answer (prediction). You also get 3 extra points in case you
 answer (predict) 3 questions right in a row & 5 extra points (loyalty bonus) for answer (predicting) all questions for a match.

 4. The winners for a match are decided depending upon their scores & time taken to answer (predict) all questions.

 5. Prizes will be given basis the prize metrics for the game.

 6. Some Predication matches may have entry by 
doing an activity like watch a video.

1. You get 90 seconds to answer as many questions
 as you can (max questions you can answer is 25).

 2. There are 3 options for each question, one of them
 is the answer for the question.

 3. You get 20 points for each right answer.

 4. You get (-)10 points for each wrong answer.

 5. You get 10 points as hattrick bonus if you answer 3
 questions correctly in a row.

 6. The winners for the quiz is decided depending
 upon the scores of all the users that participated in
 the quiz.

 7. Winners for each quiz will be declared at a pre-defined time.
Let\'s see who get more answers correct in quizzes

1. Invite all your friends
 2. Ask them to install app & sign up with mobile number
 3. Make sure you & your friends play same Quiz contests
 4. Score high & see who ends up with better rank at 
the time of winners announcement
Invite your friends on app & help them also to test their knowledge in various categories of quizzes
Refer app to your friends & ask them to register on app.\n
Score high in quizzes & compete with your friends.\n
